argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tfri1.1 | |- F = recs ( G ) |
| 2 |  | tfri1.2 | |- ( Fun G /\ ( G ` x ) e. _V ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_tfri1 | |- F Fn On |
| 4 |  | #P_fndm | |- ( F Fn On -> dom F = On ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_ax-mp | |- dom F = On |
| 6 | 5 | #P_eleq2i | |- ( A e. dom F <-> A e. On ) |
| 7 | 1 | #P_tfr2a | |- ( A e. dom F -> ( F ` A ) = ( G ` ( F |` A ) ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_sylbir | |- ( A e. On -> ( F ` A ) = ( G ` ( F |` A ) ) ) |
